title: SaladPride
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Thai, Western, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An eatery, opened in early 2016, serving breakfast bowls, salad bowls and comfort bowls, along with smoothies, hot drinks and Wholly Cakes. Most of the main dishes are vegan, plus others can be made vegan. All cakes are vegan and contain no refined sugar.
